componentDescription: Defines the main functional component responsible for rendering a status indicator.

label.description: An optional text label to display alongside the status indicator.

status.description: The current status of the indicator, determining its visual appearance (e.g., 'success', 'warning', 'error').

views.description: Custom styles to apply to different parts of the StatusIndicator component, allowing for theme overrides.

themeMode.description: Specifies the visual theme mode for the component, either 'light' or 'dark'.
